name: mithril-interactive-tutorial
description: Step-by-step lessons on using the Mithril MVC framework

scripts.tutorial: npm run clean-build; npm run make-directories; npm run copy-assets; npm run watch-js & npm run watch-jade & npm run watch-stylus & npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run copy-assets && browserify src/app.coffee -t coffeeify -o build/bundle.js && jade src/ -o build/ && stylus src/ -o build/

author: pelonpelon
